name: NFCReaderSession
desc: The abstract base class that represents a reader session for detecting NFC tags.

items.name: class var readingAvailable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the device supports NFC tag reading.

items.name: var delegate: AnyObject?
items.desc: The delegate of the reader session.

items.name: var sessionQueue: DispatchQueue
items.desc: The queue on which the reader session delegate callbacks and completion block handlers are dispatched.
